name: Paybox Solutions
overview:
Paybox Solutions AG provides mobile payment software solutions for financial services, mobile and fixed line operators, distributors, MVNOs, customer brands, and ISPs. It offers TopUp Mobiliser that allows customers to buy airtime and various credit, such as loyalty points and a voucher value electronically; and Brand Mobiliser that provides access to and interaction with mobile content, commerce, subscription, and marketing services through SMS short code. The company also offers Money Mobiliser that transforms mobile phone into a micro-bank enabling services, such as cross-border money transfer, and paying for bills, shopping, parking, tickets vending machines, and executing mobile bank services; and Card Mobiliser that enables customers to link private-label and branded payment cards to their virtual accounts and enable POS payments and ATM-cash withdrawals. Its solutions are deployed in Europe, North and South America, North Africa, the Middle East, and Asia.

The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Raunheim, Germany. As of December 30, 2008, Paybox Solutions AG operates as a subsidiary of Sybase, Inc.
